page.title: 20CLUBS GUIDES 75 ANNIVERSARY
page.content: 1985 is the 75th year of the{Guides and was celebrated in our area by a pageant at Baiter in Poole. We set off at 9.00 a m by coach from the Ferndown Sports Centre. When we arrived at Baiter, the Guiders put up a tent for our section, the North East Forest District. In the morning we had a celebratory parade with Guides carrying banners and flags and singing the special 75th year celebration song. There were side shows as well as the actual pageant. We took packed lunches and teas, and also bought ice creams from the vans. Everyone had a piece of one of the several celebration cakes. Nearly everyone took part in the pageant about the history of Guiding. My name is Joanna Taylor.
